pullrequest.title: Updated the MassMatrix3::ValidMoments to use an epsilon and >=

content.raw: That all makes sense. The motivation came up while working a few tests that compare SDF and ignition-math generation of inertia with those generated programmatically from Drake. The inconsistency was noticed, and here we are. I'll decline this and work around the issue on the drake side.
content.html: That all makes sense. The motivation came up while working a few tests that compare SDF and ignition-math generation of inertia with those generated programmatically from Drake. The inconsistency was noticed, and here we are. I'll decline this and work around the issue on the drake side.
